flavorText.text:
もりの　なかの　みずべで　くらす。
ひるまは　もりの　そとに　でて
こうらの　きに　ひかりを　あてる。

きれいな　みずが　わきでる　ばしょを
しっていて　なかまの　ポケモンを
せなかに　のせて　そこまで　はこぶ。

もりの　なかの　みずべで　くらす。
ひるまは　もりの　そとに　でて
こうらの　きに　ひかりを　あてる。

きれいな　みずが　わきでる　ばしょを
しっていて　なかまの　ポケモンを
せなかに　のせて　そこまで　はこぶ。

숲 속의 물가에서 산다.
낮에는 숲 밖으로 나와서
등껍질의 나무에 빛을 쬔다.

깨끗한 물이 솟아나는 장소를
알고 있어서 동료 포켓몬을
등에 태우고 그곳까지 데려다 준다.

숲 속의 물가에서 산다.
낮에는 숲 밖으로 나와서
등껍질의 나무에 빛을 쬔다.

깨끗한 물이 솟아나는 장소를
알고 있어서 동료 포켓몬을
등에 태우고 그곳까지 데려다 준다.

Il sait d’instinct où trouver une
source d’eau pure. Il y transporte
d’autres Pokémon sur son dos.

Il sait d’instinct où trouver une
source d’eau pure. Il y transporte
d’autres Pokémon sur son dos.

Il vit en forêt près de l’eau. En journée, il la quitte
pour dorer sa carapace feuillue au soleil.

Il sait d’instinct où trouver une source d’eau pure.
Il y transporte d’autres Pokémon sur son dos.

Il vit en forêt près de l’eau. En journée, il la quitte pour dorer
sa carapace feuillue au soleil.

Il sait d’instinct où trouver une source d’eau pure.
Il y transporte d’autres Pokémon sur son dos.

Es lebt in der Nähe von Wasser in Wäldern.
Tagsüber verlässt es diese, um ein Sonnenbad
zu nehmen.

Es weiß, wo es reinstes Quellwasser finden kann.
Trägt andere Pokémon auf seinem Rücken dorthin.

Es lebt in der Nähe von Wasser in Wäldern. Tagsüber verlässt
es diese, um ein Sonnenbad zu nehmen.

Es weiß, wo es reinstes Quellwasser finden kann.
Trägt andere Pokémon auf seinem Rücken dorthin.

Vive en los bosques cerca del agua. Por el día, sale a
que les dé el sol a las plantas de su espalda.

Sabe dónde encontrar manantiales de agua pura y
lleva a los Pokémon amigos hasta allí en su lomo.

Vive en los bosques cerca del agua. Por el día, sale a que les
dé el sol a las plantas de su espalda.

Sabe dónde encontrar manantiales de agua pura y lleva a
los Pokémon amigos hasta allí en su lomo.

Vive nelle foreste vicino all’acqua, ma esce di giorno
per far prendere sole alle piante sul guscio.

Sa come trovare sorgenti incontaminate, dove porta
i Pokémon amici tenendoli sulla schiena.

Vive nelle foreste vicino all’acqua, ma esce di giorno per far
prendere sole alle piante sul guscio.

Sa come trovare sorgenti incontaminate, dove porta i Pokémon
amici tenendoli sulla schiena.

It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

A GROTLE that lives in the forest
is said to have its own secret
springwater.

It lives along water in forests. In
the daytime, it leaves the forest
to sunbathe its treed shell.

The shell is hardened soil. Some
Pokémon come to peck the berries
growing on the trees on its back.

It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

is said to have its own secret
springwater.

It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

It lives along water in forests. In the daytime,
it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow
Pokémon there on its back.

It lives along water in forests. In the daytime,
it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow
Pokémon there on its back.

Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows
on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.
